# SKProductStorePromotionVisibility.default

**Case**

Indicates product visibility is the same as the default value set in App Store Connect.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Enumeration cases

- **SKProductStorePromotionVisibility.hide**: Indicates product is hidden.
- **SKProductStorePromotionVisibility.show**: Indicates product is shown.
title: SKProductStorePromotionVisibility.default
